sentences.en: He had been a cub reporter for the Kansas City Star.
sentences.cn: 他曾是《堪萨斯城市星报》的一名年轻记者。

sentences.en: It is a neighborhood beset by all the usual inner-city problems.
sentences.cn: 这是个为各种内城常见问题所困扰的社区。

sentences.en: Leningrad was the third alien city to offer him a surrogate home.
sentences.cn: 列宁格勒是他在异地安家的第三个外国城市。

sentences.en: Now we live further away from the city centre.
sentences.cn: 现在我们住得离市中心更远了。

sentences.en: Officers were going to retake sectors of the city.
sentences.cn: 军官们打算重新夺回该市的防御区。

sentences.en: Shops in Ho Chi Minh City are stacked with goods.
sentences.cn: 胡志明市的商店里堆满了商品。

sentences.en: The city has been flattened by heavy artillery bombardments.
sentences.cn: 城市已被猛烈的炮火夷为平地。

sentences.en: The city has trebled the number of its prisoners to 21,000.
sentences.cn: 该市的囚犯人数增长了两倍，达到21,000人。

sentences.en: The city police set up roadblocks to check passing vehicles.
sentences.cn: 该市警察设置了路障以检查过往车辆。

sentences.en: The city proved to be something of a disappointment.
sentences.cn: 结果这座城市有点儿令人失望。

sentences.en: The city was walled and built upon a rock.
sentences.cn: 这座城市建在岩石上，四周筑有城墙。

sentences.en: The City's reputation has been sullied by scandals like those at Lloyd's.
sentences.cn: 类似劳埃德保险公司的那些丑闻令伦敦名声扫地。

sentences.en: The journey ends in the ancient city of Marrakesh.
sentences.cn: 旅行的终点是马拉喀什古城。

sentences.en: The London City Ballet has engaged two male dancers from the Bolshoi.
sentences.cn: 伦敦市芭蕾舞团从波修瓦芭蕾舞团聘来了两名男舞蹈演员。

sentences.en: The nearest big city was St. Louis.
sentences.cn: 最近的大城市是圣路易斯。

sentences.en: Truckloads of food, blankets, and other necessities reached the city.
sentences.cn: 成车的食物、毯子与其他必需品抵达了该市。

words.tran_cn: 都市风尚的；有都市气概的

phrases.tran_cn: 大城市的中心区；闹市区
n. 主办城市；举办城市
